Subskills.name: On The Deck
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using anchor swing.

Subskills.name: Anchoring the Anchor
Subskills.description: Throw the anchor on target location unleashing another anchor swinging around that one with increased radius.

Subskills.name: Spin to Win
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of anchor swing.

Subskills.name: Baby Anchor
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to summon a small anchor spinning close to the pirate.

Subskills.name: iAnchor
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional anchor.

Subskills.name: Frozen Tip
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by anchor and freezes monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Trembling Smash
Subskills.description: Send the anchor forward unleashing a shockwave of torrents to all directions when hitting terrain.

Subskills.name: Man of War
Subskills.description: Increases anchor size and area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Extended Weight
Subskills.description: Anchor now has an additional spinning anchor attached to it.

Subskills.name: Colossal Anchor
Subskills.description: Unleash a massive anchor covering a wide radius with increased damage. Anchor swing now has a cooldown.
